benchmark_details.name: ScenEval
benchmark_details.overview: ScenEval is constructed from problems in textbooks, an online tutorial website, and Stack Overflow to evaluate large language models for code generation through scenario-based testing.
benchmark_details.data_type: coding tasks with scenario metadata in JSON format

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for scenario-based evaluation of machine learning models capable of code generation.

data.source: Extracted from textbooks, online learning websites, and Stack Overflow.
data.annotation: Extracted manually and automatically with metadata tagging.

methodology.calculation: Measured by the percentage of test cases passed for generated solutions.
methodology.interpretation: Pass@1 metric indicates the correctness of a generated solution.
methodology.validation: Test cases validated through Java unit testing.
